name: Bilwis
conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

trait.name: Air Form
text: The bilwis can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Whirlwind (Recharge 5-6)
text: Each creature in the bilwis' space and within 5 feet of it must make a DC 12 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't knocked prone.
